entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight then 40 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 21 January 2023
